import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Form, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; import "./SignupDetails.css"; const SignupDetails = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [userData, setUserData] = useState({ name: "", email: "", password: "", passwordConfirm: "", phoneNumber: "", }); const submitHandler = async (event) => { event.preventDefault(); setUserData({ name: "", email: "", password: "", passwordConfirm: "", phoneNumber: "", }); navigate("/users/login"); }; return (

Signup



setUserData({ ...userData, name: e.target.value }) } />


setUserData({ ...userData, email: e.target.value }) } />


setUserData({ ...userData, password: e.target.value }) } />


setUserData({ ...userData, passwordConfirm: e.target.value }) } />


setUserData({ ...userData, phoneNumber: e.target.value }) } />


); }; export default SignupDetails;
